To set up the device and get going you must do the following:

1.Turn on bluetooth on your phone.

2.Connect to the bluetooth device named HC-05 with password 1234.

3.Go back to the app and click on Pair device and measure your pulse.

4.Click on search button and choose HC-05 and connect to it using the connect button.

5.Congrats! now place your finger on the heart sensor and view your heart rate.
